autobuild:
<command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/ace/config.h output='#include \x22ace/config-linux.h\x22
'"/> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='boost=1
ace_for_tao = 1
qt4=1
ace_qt4reactor=1
tao_qtresource=1
QTDIR=/usr
PLATFORM_QT_LDFLAGS = -L$(QTDIR)/lib64
include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/bin/MakeProjectCreator/config/default.features output='boost=1
ace_for_tao=1
ssl=0
rwho=0
qt4=1
'" />
